description: Developed a Vue component/package for the TradingView trading terminal, integrating it into existing or new Vue pages. Utilized the TradingView charting library and adhered to their documentation for seamless integration. Ensured real-time communication with the server using TradingView's proprietary API. Implemented the TradeStation API for account management and trade execution within the TradingView terminal. Demonstrated proficiency in Vue, JavaScript, and API integration.

Developed and maintained a web application using ReactJS, Redux, Java, and Spring Boot for real-time financial data monitoring and analysis. Implemented new features with TypeScript, GraphQL, and SPA concepts to enhance user experience and performance. Ensured accessibility compliance, performed rigorous testing with Jest, and managed deployments using AWS cloud services.

Built a new headless frontend using PWA and React, integrated TailwindCSS and Material-UI for design. Managed third-party integrations and implemented CI/CD processes with CircleCI. Collaborated with teams across engineering and design to maintain code quality through regular reviews.

Engineered major features for a customer-facing mobile app using React Native and AWS Amplify. Implemented scalable cloud solutions and optimized performance-critical app features, improving user engagement by 30% and reducing manual testing time by 50% with automated testing frameworks.

Developed modern, robust code across a variety of languages and frameworks for both client and internal projects. Implemented a GraphQL API with Apollo and a custom caching strategy using Redis, improving response times and performance.

Architected and implemented the front-end for Namma's web-based applications, including a Facebook Messenger extension and a web player widget. Collaborated with design teams to establish a consistent visual language and optimized web performance significantly.
